##Problem 2
load and tidy the data 
```{r}
accel_data = read_csv("./accel_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    weekday_weekend = ifelse(day %in% c("Saturday","Sunday"), "Weekend", "Weekday"),
    day_id = as.integer(day_id),
    week = as.integer(week)
  ) %>% 
  relocate(weekday_weekend)
accel_data
```
